name: Werewolf in SPACE!
description:
Werewolf in Space

You're werewolf in SPAAAACE...

Nobody fucks with a warewolf,

Especially in 10 seconds.

Controls:

Arrow keys- movement

X - Attack if you're werewolf

C- Jump if you're human, or Great werewolf

V - Charge when you are great Werewolf

Goal: Defeat the biggest worm and hidden enemy.

Team:

Iga Brzezińska

Adrian Kubiak

Maciek Golec

Tomek Jaworski
